ğŸ’» Java ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯¦ä½œ1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768import java.util.*;public class Main{    public static boolean isBetween(int queen, int king, int queen2){        if(queen2 > queen){            int tmp = queen2;            queen2 = queen;            queen = tmp;        }        if(queen > king && king > queen2){            return true;        }        return false;    }    public static void main(String[] args){        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);        while(in.hasNext()){            int king = in.nextInt();            int queen = in.nextInt();            int queen2 = in.nextInt();            if(king == queen){                System.out.println("Illegal state");                continue;            }            int kingX = king % 8;            int kingY = king / 8;            int queenX = queen % 8;            int queenY = queen / 8;            int queen2X = queen2 % 8;            int queen2Y = queen2 / 8;            boolean illegalMove = false;            if(queenX != queen2X && queenY != queen2Y){     //queen moves diagonally                illegalMove = true;            }            else if(queen == queen2 || queen2 == king){                      illegalMove = true;            }            //queen2 across king            else if((queenX == kingX && queenX == queen2X && isBetween(queenY, kingY, queen2Y)) || (queenY == kingY && queenY == queen2Y && isBetween(queenX, kingX, queen2X))){                illegalMove = true;            }            if(illegalMove){                System.out.println("Illegal move");                continue;            }            if((king + 1 == queen2 && queen2X != 0) || (king - 1 == queen2 && queen2X != 7) || (king + 8 == queen2) || (king - 8 == queen2)){                System.out.println("Move not allowed");                continue;            }            if((queen2 == 9 && king == 0) || (queen2 == 14 && king == 7) || (queen2 == 49 && king == 56) || (queen2 == 54 && king == 63)){                System.out.println("Stop");            }            else{                System.out.println("Continue");            }        }    }}

Javaç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯¦ä½œ12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031import java.util.*;public class Main{    public static void main(String[] args){        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);        ArrayList<String> line = new ArrayList<>();        String tmp;        int max = 0;        while(in.hasNext()){            tmp = in.nextLine();            line.add(tmp);            if(tmp.length() > max)  max = tmp.length();        }        for(int i = 0; i < line.size(); i++){            tmp = line.get(i);            while(tmp.length() < max){                tmp += " ";            }            line.set(i, tmp);        }        for(int i = 0; i < max; i++){            for(int j = line.size() - 1; j >= 0; j--){                System.out.print(line.get(j).charAt(i));            }            System.out.println("");        }    }}

ğŸ’» Java ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯¦ä½œ1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344import java.util.*;public class Main{    public static void main(String[] args){        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);        ArrayList<String> token = new ArrayList<>();        while(true){            String str = in.nextLine();            if(str.equals("0")) break;            String tmp = "";            for(int i = 0; i < str.length();){                char ch = str.charAt(i);                if(Character.isLetter(ch)){                    while(i < str.length() && Character.isLetter(str.charAt(i))){                        tmp += str.charAt(i++);                    }                    System.out.print(tmp);                    token.add(0, tmp);                    tmp = "";                }                else if(Character.isDigit(ch)){                    int index = 0;                    while(i < str.length() && Character.isDigit(str.charAt(i))){                        index = index * 10 + str.charAt(i++) - '0';                     }                    String s = token.get(index-1);                    System.out.print(s);                    token.remove(index - 1);                    token.add(0, s);                }                else{                    System.out.print(ch);                    i++;                }            }            System.out.println("");        }    }}

Javaç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯¦ä½œ123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445import java.util.*;public class Main{    public static void main(String[] args){        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);        int index = 1;        while(in.hasNext()){            int n = in.nextInt();   //# of keywords            int m = in.nextInt();   //# of excues            in.nextLine();            String[] keyword_list = new String[n];            String[] excue_list = new String[m];                        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)  keyword_list[i] = in.nextLine();            for(int i = 0; i < m; i ++) excue_list[i] = in.nextLine();            int[] times = new int[m];            int max = -1;            for(int i = 0; i < m; i++){                int tmp = 0;                String[] str = excue_list[i].split("[^a-zA-Z]+");                for(int j = 0; j < n; j ++){                    for(int k = 0; k < str.length; k++){                        if(str[k].toLowerCase().equals(keyword_list[j])){                            tmp++;                        }                    }                }                if(tmp > max)   max = tmp;                times[i] = tmp;            }                        System.out.println("Excuse Set #" + index);            for(int i = 0; i < m; i++){                if(times[i] == max){                    System.out.println(excue_list[i]);                }            }            System.out.println("");            index++;        }    }}

ğŸ’» Java ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯¦ä½œ1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344import java.util.*;public class Main{    public static void main(String[] args){        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);        Map<Character, Character> map = new HashMap<Character, Character>();        map.put('A', 'A'); map.put('E', '3');        map.put('H', 'H'); map.put('I', 'I');        map.put('J', 'L'); map.put('L', 'J');        map.put('M', 'M'); map.put('O', 'O');        map.put('S', '2'); map.put('T', 'T');        map.put('U', 'U'); map.put('V', 'V');        map.put('W', 'W'); map.put('X', 'X');        map.put('Y', 'Y'); map.put('Z', '5');        map.put('1', '1'); map.put('2', 'S');        map.put('3', 'E'); map.put('5', 'Z');        map.put('8', '8');        while(in.hasNext()){            boolean p = false;            boolean m = true;            String str = in.nextLine();            StringBuilder str2 = new StringBuilder(str);            if(str.equals(str2.reverse().toString())){                p = true;            }            for(int i = 0; i < str.length(); i++){                char ch = str.charAt(i);                char ch2 = str.charAt(str.length() - i - 1);                if(!map.containsKey(ch) || map.get(ch) != ch2){                    m = false;                    break;                }            }            if(p && m)          System.out.println(str + " -- is a mirrored palindrome.");            else if(p)     System.out.println(str + " -- is a regular palindrome.");            else if(m)    System.out.println(str + " -- is a mirrored string.");            else                System.out.println(str + " -- is not a palindrome.");            System.out.println("");        }    }}

ğŸ’» Java å¯¦ä½œç¨‹å¼ç¢¼12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334import java.util.*;public class Main{    public static void main(String[] args){        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);        int n = in.nextInt();        System.out.println("PERFECTION OUTPUT");        while(n != 0){            int k = n / 2;            int sum = 1;            for(int i = 2; i <= k; i++){                if(n % i == 0){                    sum += i;                }            }            if(sum == n && n != 1){                System.out.printf("%5d  PERFECT", n);            }            else if(sum > n){                System.out.printf("%5d  ABUNDANT", n);            }            else{                System.out.printf("%5d  DEFICIENT", n);            }            System.out.println("");            n = in.nextInt();        }        System.out.println("END OF OUTPUT");    }}
